attributes.action: Give Canadian rapper Drake a British Passport or at least honorary Citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
https://youtu.be/K2GO1dnY02U

In the words of the man himself!
attributes.background: Drake clearly thinks he’s British and has embraced our culture and promotes a British living. The youth of Britain all agree that Drake should be given some kind of citizenship if not full at least honorary.

rejection.details: Drake doesn't appear to have applied for British Citizenship. We're therefore not exactly sure what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
